Title: Pestalozzis Berg
Writer: Lukas Hartmann (novel), Peter Schneider, Peter von Gunten
Actors: Gian Maria Volontè, Rolf Hoppe, Heidi Züger, Christian Grashof
Plot: In 1770s, the Swiss farmer, Johann Heinrich Pestalozzi, established a school for poor orphaned children in the Aargau. Up to total exhaustion he sacrificed himself for his pedagogical ...
Country: East Germany, Switzerland, Italy, West Germany
